alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 4:44AM CST until January 04 at 5:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 530 AM CST. * At 444 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Loxley, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzalez, Pace, Robertsdale, Molino, Jay, Pea Ridge and Floridatown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
